74648.summary: Some customers in the Capilano Highlands area of North Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
74648.title: Mar 27 - North Vancouver  (Capilano Highlands) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
